pageProduct.name: Advantage for Cats over 4kg 6 pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Advantage is a once a month topical flea treatment for cats and kittens 8 weeks or older and dogs and puppies 7 weeks or older. This product kills 98-100% of the fleas on cats and dogs within 12 hours.

Ingredients

100 g/L Imidacloprid

Directions

Place the applicator tip through the animals hair to the skin level. On cats, apply to skin on neck at the base of the skull. For dogs up to 25kg, apply to skin on back between the shoulder blades. For dogs over 25kg apply in divided doses between the shoulder blades on the back between the hips and one point in between. Do not get this product in the pet’s eyes or mouth.
